description: The Communications Workers of America organized a protest by union leaders and tech workers outside of a Silicon Valley conference on offshore outsourcing. The protest is part of a long-term campaign to raise awareness among the public and politicians about the growing trend of overseas outsourcing of IT jobs.
author: CM
